USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t Struct Reference
[MIDI Class Host Mode Driver]

#include <MIDI.h>

Data Fields

struct {
   uint8_t   DataINPipeNumber
   bool   DataINPipeDoubleBank
   uint8_t   DataOUTPipeNumber
   bool   DataOUTPipeDoubleBank
} Config
struct {
   bool   IsActive
   uint16_t   DataINPipeSize
   uint16_t   DataOUTPipeSize
} State

Detailed Description

Class state structure. An instance of this structure should be made within the user application, and passed to each of the MIDI class driver functions as the MIDIInterfaceInfo parameter. This stores each MIDI interface's configuration and state information.

Field Documentation

struct { ... } USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::Config

Config data for the USB class interface within the device. All elements in this section must be set or the interface will fail to enumerate and operate correctly.

bool USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::DataINPipeDoubleBank
uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::DataINPipeNumber

Pipe number of the MIDI interface's streaming IN data pipe

uint16_t USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::DataINPipeSize

Size in bytes of the MIDI Streaming Data interface's IN data pipe

bool USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::DataOUTPipeDoubleBank
uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::DataOUTPipeNumber

Indicates if the MIDI interface's IN data pipe should use double banking Pipe number of the MIDI interface's streaming OUT data pipe

uint16_t USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::DataOUTPipeSize

Size in bytes of the MIDI Streaming Data interface's OUT data pipe

bool USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::IsActive

Indicates if the current interface instance is connected to an attached device, valid after MIDI_Host_ConfigurePipes() is called and the Host state machine is in the Configured state

struct { ... } USB_ClassInfo_MIDI_Host_t::State

State data for the USB class interface within the device. All elements in this section may be set to initial values, but may also be ignored to default to sane values when the interface is enumerated.
